content_parts.title: Features
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (25.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content: In Bank Manager, you have access to additional record statuses and you can manage bank feeds asynchronously when there are more than 100 lines.

You can duplicate forms and documents on the following pages:

  • Bill of materials
  • Container
  • Location
  • Location type
  • Storage zone
  • Stock sequence number

content_parts.title: Features
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (25.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content:
For standard cost valued items, the stock journal entry for receipts calculates and records the difference between the actual and standard cost as the non-absorbed amount.

Subsequent cost variances, relative to the original receipt, generate a value correction in the stock journal entry.

content_parts.title: Purchase requisition: Save button not available when duplicating

content_parts.content: When duplicating a purchase requisition, you can save and create an identical requisition without making any changes to the duplicated record.

content_parts.title: Purchase return: Workflow after changing the quantity of an item

content_parts.content: When changing the quantity of an item in a purchase return, you need to submit for approval before being able to approve or reject the return.

content_parts.title: Features
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (25.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Manufacturing' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content: You can assign a work Category to create a work order without operations or without components. The default Assembly, Normal, and Rework categories determine if the routing and/or bill of material is loaded to the work order. Uses routing and Uses bill of material checkboxes, and a Category field in the work order header confirm the assigned category. You can create additional work categories. You can also add a routing and a bill of material, and unplanned operations and components to a work order by selecting the Uses routing and Uses bill of material checkbox, and the Add operation and Add component button respectively.
The Stock detailed inquiry provides stock data for individual items per site. Data includes stock levels, stock status, lot details, and serial number data.

content_parts.title: Features
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (25.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Platform' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content: Create dashboards to keep track of key data such as sales, purchase orders, and more. You can start with a predefined template and customize as needed or build your own dashboard.

content_parts.title: Improvements
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (25.0.0)") AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Reference data' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Reference data' AND status IN (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes))

content_parts.content: On the Support access page, you can give a Sage support technician access to your tenant if you need help. The support access is limited and you can revoke access at any time.

content_parts.title: Stock sequence number: Populated fields not clearing when a component type is changed

content_parts.content: When you change a component type on the stock sequence number, the 'Constant' column only includes the allowed values for the component type.

content_parts.title: Sequence numbers skip 10 and multiples of 10 on new documents

content_parts.content: Document numbers automatically assigned to newly created documents no longer skip the number 10 and multiples of 10.
